ygData.subject: RE: Diamond Dust.....
ygData.msgSnippet: What level is Meldrath?  Is he getting camped often nowadays?  I know he was pretty much ignored when I was in that area way back in summer under another
ygData.messageBody:
What level is Meldrath? Is he getting camped often nowadays? I know he was
pretty much ignored when I was in that area way back in summer under another
guise.

Leagnomo

-----Original Message-----
From: Malcolm O'Callaghan [mailto:malcolmo@...]
Sent: Tuesday, January 04, 2000 11:25 AM
To: 'EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Diamond Dust.....


From: Malcolm O'Callaghan <malcolmo@...>

If its a level 50 mob, my guess would be the dinosaur in OOT.

It would have to be a little camped level 50 and this is the only one I can
think of, unless the big shark in Lake Rathe is level 50. I would look
toward big mobs that have no know special drop.

-hax
